location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from the Race Ball Committee, Nusseerabad [Nasīrābād] to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Note to Pelly apologising for the unavoidable delay in sending Pelly's invitation to the ball as they were not aware of his camps movements or where to send the invitiation.Enclosed are the earlier invitation and correspondence on the matter:Invitation, dated 7 September 1874, from the race ball committee to Lewis Pelly to attend their ballExtract of a note from General Woolcombe dated 12 September 1874 requesting that the committee be advised that such invitations should be done in the proper time and proper form.
